name: mbg-seeders
description: Seeding scripts for MBG (Makanan Bergizi Gratis) database

scripts.seed:all: npm run seed:users && npm run seed:menu-items && npm run seed:deliveries && npm run seed:allocations && npm run seed:verifications && npm run seed:payments && npm run seed:issues && npm run seed:escrow-transactions && npm run seed:payment-events && npm run seed:delivery-confirmations && npm run seed:public-payment-feed && npm run seed:refunds && npm run seed:payment-methods && npm run seed:blockchain-sync-log && npm run seed:poverty-data-cache && npm run seed:ai-food-analyses && npm run seed:anomaly-alerts && npm run seed:vendor-risk-assessments
scripts.seed:ai-features: npm run seed:poverty-data-cache && npm run seed:ai-food-analyses && npm run seed:anomaly-alerts && npm run seed:vendor-risk-assessments
